metadata.title: CVE-2021-38371 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The STARTTLS feature in Exim through 4.94.2 allows response injection (buffering) during MTA SMTP sending.

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2022-01-05, the upstream advisory has not been published yet, and there are no details on what fixes this issue.

criterions.comment: exim4 package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-05').
